Title: DIS Windows Phone Toolkit
Description: A combination of controls and helper classes used across many of my own Windows Phone apps to help with the ease of new and current Silverlight apps.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A combination of controls and helper classes used across many of my own Windows Phone apps to help with the ease of new and current Silverlight apps.

You can install the latest stable version through NuGet

PM> Install-Package DisWpToolkit
